content: the sweet sweet comforts of home what s more cozy than homey decorations especially if they include lace and/or bobbles the free download home sweet home table runner is the perfect addition to your boho or farmhouse chic decor your tables need not be naked ever again made with budget-friendly worsted weight cotton yarn this project doesn t need to break your bank i used lion brand re-up but you can use any worsted cotton on hand pattern includes a written and photo tutorial for the bobble detail notes are included to adjust length to preference please see below for legal info notes on sale and distribution *feel free to sell what you make from this pattern giving credit to lady jay crochet for the design *please do credit @ladyjaycrochet for the design when posting to social media use hashtag #ladyjaycrochet so i can see your finished masterpiece  *please do not alter this pattern in any way and claim as your own design *this pattern is offered as a free download courtesy of lady jay crochet please do not or alter in any way and sell it as your own pattern thank you pattern release april 20th 2020
